backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all core data types (TVProgram, VideoContent, TVSeries, LiveChannel, Brand, AdMedia, etc.) and the application's backend logic including storage, authorization, Stripe, and HTTP outcall integrations.
backend/migration.mo: Minimal migration module with stub OldActor and NewActor types and a no-op run function used for state migration between actor versions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs (Movies, Podcasts, Videos, Clips management fixes) to their relevant frontend files, component dependencies, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON document providing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference for the app's component and page structure.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the FAITH X-Stream React app, loading the root div and main.tsx module with a custom favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines all TanStack Router routes (home, live, movies, podcasts, admin, etc.) and wraps the app with ThemeProvider, AuthProvider, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/AnalyticsD: An admin dashboard component that fetches and displays platform analytics including total views, premium users, ad impressions, revenue, and a trending content list.
frontend/src/components/admin/BrandManag: An admin panel for creating, deleting, and managing brands, including uploading a logo and assigning films, series, clips, or live channels to a selected brand.
frontend/src/components/admin/ChannelMan: Admin component for creating, editing, and deleting live TV channels, including logo upload support and toggling original channel status.
frontend/src/components/admin/ClipsManag: Admin component for managing video clips, supporting CRUD operations and auto-clip generation from source videos with upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/admin/LiveSchedu: Admin component for managing live channel schedules, allowing admins to add and remove scheduled content programs for selected channels.
frontend/src/components/admin/ManualAdsM: Admin component for uploading ad media files and managing ad assignments (global or targeted) with configurable display settings.
frontend/src/components/admin/MasterAdmi: Master admin-only component for viewing all users and promoting or demoting them between user, admin, and master admin roles with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/MoviesMana: Admin UI component for managing movie/film content, providing a dialog-based form to create, edit, and delete video entries with file upload support for video, thumbnail, and trailer assets.
frontend/src/components/admin/PodcastsMa: Admin UI component for managing podcast content, offering a dialog form to add, edit, and delete podcast entries with video and thumbnail file upload capabilities.
frontend/src/components/admin/SeriesMana: Admin UI component for managing TV series, seasons, and episodes, supporting creation and editing of series with nested season/episode dialogs and file uploads for thumbnails, trailers, and episode videos.
frontend/src/components/admin/StripeSetu: Admin UI component for configuring Stripe payment integration, allowing entry of a secret key and allowed countries, and displaying current configuration status.
frontend/src/components/admin/VideoManag: Admin UI component for managing standalone video content (excluding movies, films, and podcasts), with a dialog form for creating, editing, and deleting videos including file upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/BrandRail.tsx: Horizontally scrollable brand content rail displaying a brand's films, series, and clips with navigation arrows and a link to the brand detail page.
A vertical scroll-snapping feed component that displays short video clips with thumbnail backgrounds, play buttons, and metadata overlays. Uses intersection observer for autoplay detection and navigates to the watch page on click.
frontend/src/components/ContentRow.tsx: A horizontally scrollable row of video or series cards with left/right navigation arrows and an optional 'See All' button. Differentiates between VideoContent and TVSeries items to render the appropriate card component.
A reusable dialog modal that displays contextual messages with type-specific icons (info, coming-soon, under-construction, feature-preview) and optional action/close buttons.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with navigation links grouped into Browse, Discover, and Account sections, conditionally showing sign-in or profile links based on authentication state, plus a copyright line.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky site header with logo, desktop navigation links, search icon, and an auth-aware user menu that supports login via Internet Identity and logout with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: A full-width hero banner that auto-rotates through featured VideoContent or TVSeries items, displaying a background video or thumbnail with gradient overlays, play/info buttons, and a mute toggle.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps all pages with a Header, Footer, and router Outlet, and conditionally renders a ProfileSetupModal for Internet Identity users who haven't completed their profile.
frontend/src/components/live/LiveGuideGr: Renders an EPG-style program guide grid with a fixed channel column and a horizontally scrollable time-slot grid, auto-scrolling to the current time on mount.
frontend/src/components/LiveTVSyncPlayer: File is empty with no content.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog component that collects a new user's display name and email, assigns the 'user' role via the backend actor, and saves the profile, invalidating the React Query cache on success.
frontend/src/components/SeriesCard.tsx: A clickable card component that displays a TV series thumbnail, title, season/episode count, and an 'Original' badge, navigating to the series detail page on click.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: A clickable card component that renders a video thumbnail with Premium and Original badges, title, and genre, navigating to the watch page on click.
frontend/src/components/VideoPlayer.tsx: A full-featured custom HTML5 video player supporting ads (pre-roll/mid-roll), autoplay with trailer or preview mode, live TV seeking, quality selection, and standard playback controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates all dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.tsx: Provides an AuthContext that manages user authentication state (Internet Identity and email-based), role fetching, login/logout, and persistence via localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing identity state, login/clear functions, and login status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useIntersectionAutopl: Custom hook that uses IntersectionObserver to track visibility of a list of elements and fires a callback when each item crosses a configurable visibility threshold.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend data fetching and mutations, covering user profiles, roles, videos, channels, ads, analytics, and more.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionStorageStat: A useState-like hook that persists its value in sessionStorage, initializing from stored data and syncing updates back to storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useVerticalScrollSnap: Hook that listens to scroll events on a container ref and fires a debounced callback with the snapped item index after scrolling stops.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, defines CSS custom properties for a dark red-themed design system using OKLCH colors, and provides utility classes for scrollbars, gradients, and layout helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, mounting it to the root DOM element.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page that guards access by authentication and role (admin/masterAdmin), then renders a tabbed interface for managing movies, series, channels, videos, clips, podcasts, ads, analytics, Stripe, and master admin settings.
frontend/src/pages/BrandDetailPage.tsx: Brand detail page that fetches a brand by ID along with its associated films, series, and clips, then displays a branded header and content sections with loading skeletons and a not-found fallback.
frontend/src/pages/ClipsPage.tsx: Page that fetches and displays all short-form clips in a vertical-aspect grid with hover overlays and play buttons, navigating to the watch page on click.
frontend/src/pages/EpisodePlayerPage.tsx: Episode player page that resolves a series/season/episode from URL params, enforces premium access gating, selects appropriate ads for non-premium users, and renders the VideoPlayer with episode metadata.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page that fetches videos, series, and brands to compose a hero section, categorized content rows (movies, podcasts, originals), brand rails, and a clips feed with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/LivePage.tsx: Displays a Live TV page with channel selection buttons, a video player that seeks to the current program offset, and an EPG guide grid. Auto-selects the first channel on load and uses EPG utilities to determine the current program.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders a login/register page supporting both Internet Identity and email/password authentication. Handles form state, error display, and redirects authenticated users to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/MoviesPage.tsx: Shows a searchable grid of VOD movies filtered from all videos by content type. Displays skeleton loaders while fetching and an empty state when no results are found.
frontend/src/pages/NetworksPage.tsx: Lists all brand/network cards in a grid with logo images and content counts, navigating to a brand detail page on click. Shows skeletons while loading and an empty state if no brands exist.
frontend/src/pages/OriginalsPage.tsx: Displays FAITH X-Stream original content organized into tabbed sections for films, series, documentaries, and educational videos. Filters videos and series by the isOriginal flag and renders grid skeletons while loading.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Simple error page shown after a failed payment, with buttons to navigate home or retry via the admin route.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Verifies a Stripe checkout session by session ID, invalidates the user profile cache on success, and displays a confirmation screen with navigation options. Shows a spinner while the session status is loading.
frontend/src/pages/PodcastsPage.tsx: Displays a filterable grid of podcast videos fetched via `useGetAllVideos`, showing only non-clip VOD entries with `contentType === 'podcast'`. Includes a search bar, loading skeletons, and an empty state.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows the authenticated user's profile card with account details, admin badge, watch history, and a sign-out button. Handles loading, unauthenticated, and missing-profile states.
frontend/src/pages/SearchResultsPage.tsx: Executes a backend search query from the URL parameter `q` and renders categorized results (films, series, clips, brands) using `VideoCard` and `SeriesCard` components.
frontend/src/pages/SeriesDetailPage.tsx: Renders a hero banner and an accordion list of seasons/episodes for a single series fetched by ID. Each episode row has a play button that navigates to the episode watch page.
frontend/src/pages/TVShowsPage.tsx: Displays a searchable, responsive grid of all TV series fetched via `useGetAllSeries`, with loading skeletons and an empty state for no results.
frontend/src/pages/UpgradePage.tsx: Presents a premium subscription upgrade page with a Stripe checkout flow, listing plan features and pricing. Redirects admin users away automatically and shows a loading state while configuration is checked.
frontend/src/pages/VideoPlayerPage.tsx: Page component that renders a video player for a specific content item, handling premium access gating, ad assignment logic (video-specific and global), and loading/not-found states.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Empty TypeScript types index file with no current exports or definitions.
frontend/src/utils/contentType.ts: Utility functions for mapping backend ContentType enum values to human-readable labels and grouping types (e.g., movie/film, podcast).
frontend/src/utils/epg.ts: Utility module for Electronic Program Guide (EPG) logic, providing functions to generate time slots and calculate looping program block positions and metadata for live channel schedules.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom fonts, brand colors, border radii, box shadows, keyframe animations, and enabling the animate, typography, and container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project state manifest describing the media platform's features, architectural notes, known issues (admin dashboard CRUD failures), and a versioned list of existing and planned features for fix/build planning.
